search.query: `cs_oracle` (sourcetype="oracle:audit:xml" OR sourcetype="oracle:audit:unified") | fields host | stats count by host
`cs_oracle` (sourcetype="oracle:audit:xml" OR sourcetype="oracle:audit:unified") | fields user | stats count by user

`cs_oracle` (sourcetype="oracle:audit:xml" OR sourcetype="oracle:audit:unified") | fields vendor_action, ACTION_NAME | eval action_name=coalesce(vendor_action,ACTION_NAME) | stats count by action_name

`cs_oracle` sourcetype="oracle:audit:xml" $tkn_host$ vendor_action=* | rename vendor_action as action_name, DB_UNIQUE_NAME as database_name, object as object_name, object_category as object_type, DB_User as db_user, command as statement | append [ | search `cs_oracle` sourcetype="oracle:audit:unified" $tkn_host$ ACTION_NAME=* | rename ACTION_NAME as action_name, OBJECT_SCHEMA as schema_name, OBJECT_NAME as object_name, AUDIT_TYPE as object_type, DBUSERNAME as db_user, CLIENT_PROGRAM_NAME as client_app, SQL_TEXT as statement ] | fillnull value="-" user | search $tkn_user$ $tkn_action_name$ | eval status = if(RETURNCODE==0, "success", "failure"), db_host = host | `cs_human_readable_time_format(_time, event_time)` | table event_time host db_host user action_name schema_name database_name object_name object_type src db_user client_app statement status
